locations.title: L W's Truck Stop
locations.content: L W's Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Don't quite understand why you need a cdl to shower, wouldn't a dr license suffice, and if your willing to pay the 15 bucks. Kinda at a loss.

‚Ä¶ Driver BTW) forget a loves or a pilot or any of the big travel centers, this is a true truck stop with very clean showers for CDL holders only which I think is a very good policy to have, they truly cater to the truckers and it‚Äôs hard to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 8 trucks .  But it's really one of my great place to stay over night. Thank you girls. This my total cost down here . 15$  shower, and 9.24$ for 4 break fast items. Coffee, burrito, big soda, tots. And 1.38$ for can soda.  I love this ‚Ä¶

I stopped here to pay for a shower.  I was refused because I didn't have my CDL license with me.  Whoever at L. W. Miller dreamed up this policy must be the dumbest manager in the outfit.   Showers were empty, and available but not unless ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Seems to be laid back easy atmosphere with hard-working employees. However, the shower was clean but not properly. Still had another person soap in it and there were no towels had to ask for them. ‚Ä¶
The food was decent, and the tater tots turned to mush by time I got to my truck. The shower was a joke $15 for almost no water pressure. It literally just drains out with no more pressure than rain.

Driver lounge is rare to have. Thanks. I bought 90 gallons of on road diesel, then I parked and asked for a shower. Because I didn‚Äôt already have a rewards card, I was not eligible for a shower. I went to dinner with a grandson from UT St. ‚Ä¶
The nicest employees,clean shower and fresh hot food.Wonderful experience for my reset.
Great Lil place gorgeous shower water not hot enough great driver room and super sweet staff!
Clean little truck stop with 10 parking spots, Clean shower and restrooms

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I park over night at Love's all across the country. This one is one of my favorites for it's proximity to the interstate as well as it being very quiet. And as always, the bathrooms, store and gas pumps are well maintained. I'm so grateful that they allow overnight parking; I felt very safe.
Staff is friendly, the showers are big and clean , and good water pressure. The coffee and hot dog area can be cleaner.

Came here June 2022. Used showers twice and one of the showers smelled like sewage. Showers were spacious and bright with hooks conveniently close to the shower. There‚Äôs a fenced in dog area with waste bags and 2 benches. Overall pretty clean except for that one shower.

This location Has a great wall of jerky the lines of which I've never encountered in my travels. Clean bathrooms, and showers. Nice RV parking in front that fit my whole truck and giant camper. Horrible weather forced me to stop here, but ‚Ä¶

Hey I‚Äôve been driving on road for 9 hours today . I stop at LUVS for a hot shower which I paid $20 of my hard earn money . I waited 4 hours in total respectful . Once I enter back inside store I was approached by  EMMA the cashier she was ‚Ä¶

locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Small truck stop, but very friendly staff . I've never seen such a clean shower on any truck stop, even the fan is clean because it's dirty everywhere. Everything here is perfectly clean. THANK YOU Angela for super clean shower!!! Truckers ‚Ä¶
Excellent showers, clean, well renovated, hot water and a comfortable temperature in the shower. Thank you very much

We were driving overnight and I was skeptical of taking a shower at a gas station. It turned out to exceed my expectations greatly! Super clean showers and even had towels in the shower room. The water pressure was nice and temperature was ‚Ä¶

I would've left 5 stars, however, I had someone trying to open my door in my shower room. I was not happy about this and can say that this was the worst experience I've had at a Flying J. I told the cashier and I was basically blown off.

The shower rooms are smaller than a mail cell but they are clean. Thank you for that. There are so many places out there that don‚Äôt care to keep the showers clean and that‚Äôs the worst experience for me as a truck driver so far from home
‚Ä¶ Shower rooms also great! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ seriously watched every employ sit at the front desk with blank stares on their faces while no one attended to the three empty showers waiting to be cleaned, or the one washing machine that had an out of order sign on it, but looked like ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: ARTIFICIALLY INTELLIGENT LLC Marty Hoss_‚Ä¶_seriously_watched_every_employ_sit_at_the_front__2 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: I had a shower reserved through the app and was waiting in line in the driver's lounge for over 45 minutes. When it finally said I was next, I heard a man up front tell the cashier there was no one waiting why did it have him in line. Then ‚Ä¶

Debbie is amazing. Shower was good, nice hot water, except can do better water pressure. Air hose are working. Full buckets to wash your windows. Great overall experience, definitely will stop by again!  748 store thumbs up!
Slowest pilot ever cleaning the showers . Daaaam over 1 hour waiting for 1 available shower and 2nd on line wow . ü§Ø people here don‚Äôt want to work ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
Nice place
Space for truck parking
Clean shower

‚Ä¶ because I only went in to buy ice. Sooo I didn‚Äôt have a chance to fuel, shower, or even check the facility out to even be able to rate it on cleanliness or other important things like that. I‚Äôm giving it a five star because of the ‚Ä¶

If you want a shower cleaned spectacular; THIS is the place to shower. VERY clean.  Very impressive.  Parking is a nightmare.  I just always pay fer the prime spot, if I do a ten here. Most times, just stop in for the refreshingly clean ‚Ä¶

Lady was so rude. I took a shower and apparently my hair was a bother to her and she went and told the boys at Taco Bell where they then harassed me about it I got a haircut or not. Next time I‚Äôm around I‚Äôll be taking my business elsewhere ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I to spend my tens of thousands of dollars on fuel. I dont like being told to wait and waiting over 20 min for the associates here to clean ONE shower when the store is empty! Made me feel like my business didn't matter. I will take my ‚Ä¶
For those who travel alot pilot is the place to stop for a hot shower coffee and hot food, try the chicken pot pie with Hawaiian sweet roll it good!

Very nice employees happy friendly people
Clean shower rooms üòä ‚Ä¶
Clean, kind employees, shower have good water pressure, beautiful mountains view.
Shower's were great. Clean and good water pressure
Took a shower here it was amazing!! They are friendly and it was clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The fuel island has alot of traffic thru, so we all should fuel, pull up and then go into the fuel desk but go park if your breaking for a shower. I found the hotel across the street a good clean and affordable rate with cdl or Hilton ‚Ä¶
Busy stop couldn't keep up with bathrooms during morning rush. Decent size truck parking fills up. Nice lady, hot shower with "phenomenal" water pressure.
Not to bad of a truck stop but you get drivers sitting in the fuel line doing there 30 minute break or there in taking a shower so plane on a while sitting there

showerReviews.reviewText: Usually has parking available for semi-trucks, Burger King was great, Wendy's and McD across the street but policy to give cashier ID to get a shower needs to go as no other truck stop requires it. If you need to charge a deposit because ‚Ä¶

Do not stop here for a shower!!! As a truck driver it's hard enough being on the road for days at a time but when you come here and spend hundreds ( $500-1000) in fuel and get a dirty disgusting shower. Im not talking just about the shower ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Wait! Buy a mountain dew and some doritos first!  Shower? ‚Ä¶
Don‚Äôt use the shower. There is an opportunity of being  infected.
